front.title: View-based Access Control Model (VACM) for the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP)
front.abstract: This document describes the View-based Access Control Model for use in the SNMP architecture (RFC2571). It defines the Elements of Procedure for controlling access to management information. This document also includes a MIB for remotely managing the configuration parameters for the View-based Access Control Model. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
